mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oper_log ( username, ip, address, uri, url, method, params, clazz, description, os, browser, module, type, status, error_msg, json_result, create_time ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{ip}, #{address}, #{uri}, #{url}, #{method}, #{params}, #{clazz}, #{description}, #{os}, #{browser}, #{module}, #{type}, #{status}, #{errorMsg}, #{jsonResult}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM oper_log a WHERE a.id = #{id}
